name: RPG Wizard
description:
Given 3 minutes 30 seconds you have to kill a dragon, otherwise your total time of starting 5 minutes will be reduced by those 3:30.

If you manage to defeat the dragon the remaining time will be added up on those 5 minutes.

Needlessly to say, if you run out of total time, you lost.

There is a local leaderboard implemented, so you can challenge yourself.

Movement: WASD

Spells: Q E

Jump: Space

First Person with target lock on dragon: F

Music Credits: Song: Warriyo - Mortals (feat. Laura Brehm) [NCS Release] Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds Free Download/Stream: http://ncs.io/mortals Watch: http://youtu.be/yJg-Y5byMMw

if you have an issue or found a bug, feel free to report it on my github repository - https://github.com/Vulnerius/game-programming
